item.title: prelude - it's happening
item.description: Have wrapped up work in Sydney, and took a single flight Sydney -> Wellington on April 28th! The next year will be my first sabbatical and needless to say I’m excited! My biggest fear is wasting my time and realising the year is over and feel like I did not use the time wisely. How many people are blessed enough to have a year off? Not many as far as I know.
